text_block_list.text: Tomorrow, our summer camp begins.

This training camp away from home<n>is a perfect chance for
runners to<n>focus and hone their abilities.<n>However...

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: A training camp by the beach... This'll<n>be niiice.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Taking in the marine breeze as I fish<n>in the sea... Drifting to
sleep in the sun<n>with waves as my lullaby...

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Mm-hm, we're gonna have so much<n>fun! ♪

I rack my brain thinking of ways to<n>get Sky to actually train
during this<n>summer camp...

And by the time I come up with a plan,<n>the sun is already
shining through my<n>window.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Oooh, blue skies and blue seas!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: It's the perfect weather for fishing!We've gotta go surf fishing tod—

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Oh... Do we really have to train?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Fine, fine, have it your way... Hm?<n>Wait, is this a special
program?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Let's see here... "Use these hints to<n>dig up buried treasure
around the<n>beach..."

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
"If you can find all the treasure within<n>the time limit, then you
will be<n>rewarded with all-you-can-eat meals<n>at the
beachside clubhouse for the<n>rest of the camp..."

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
I get it! You're trying to rouse my<n>adventurous spirit while
also testing<n>how fast I can run!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
This training program combines both<n>fun and exercise—it's
hard to argue<n>with that.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Okay then, you've piqued my<n>curiosity! I accept—let's do
this<n>training!

Sky agrees enthusiastically to my<n>proposal, which means
pulling an<n>all-nighter to plan this was worth it.<n>Still...

The blazing rays of the sun are a bit<n>harsh for the
sleep-deprived. I should<n>make sure I stay hydrated, or I
might<n>actually collapse.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
...Eeearth to Trainer. You've been<n>spacing out a bit.
Everything okay?
choice_data_list: Right as rain. Let's keep training.
Right as rain. Let's keep training.

text_block_list.text:
I read off the next hint, and Sky<n>dashes off towards the
beach once<n>more. See, she can do it if she tri—

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Whoaaa, Trainer?!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Hey now... You okay?!

I lose my balance, falling onto the<n>sandy beach. The whole
world goes<n>black...
Opening my eyes, I find myself lying<n>on a couch in the lodge.
Last I remember, I was training on the<n>beach with Sky...

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text:
...Hey, it's almost dinnertime, but Sei<n>still hasn't come back,
right? Where<n>did she go this time?

text_block_list.name: Umamusume B
text_block_list.text:
Well, she did say she was going to<n>the beach for some
fishing earlier...

Looks like Sei is still out by the water.<n>I decide to get up and
go look for her.
Outside, I see a familiar silhouette<n>running along the shore.
Crunch, crunch...

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Whew... I'd say I've outdone myself<n>this time.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: But just in case, I'll do two—no, three<n>more laps.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Wait, whoa! Trainer?!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Oh, um... glad you woke up. I don't<n>know what I'd do if you
never got up<n>again.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Still, the more you rest, the more I get<n>to slack off. So it
wasn't the worst<n>deal for me.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: I had a bunch of fun while you were<n>out, you know.

She says that, but I notice specks of<n>sand all over her
tracksuit.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Those eyes of yours see right<n>through me, don't they?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
It's true that I love slacking off, but<n>even I know there's a
time and place<n>for it.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
How should I put it... You worked<n>yourself to the bone
planning all this<n>for me, so I wanted to make good on<n>it.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
If I'm not mistaken, and I rarely ever<n>am... Did I... just level
up again?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Da-dada-da-dada-daaah! ♪

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Yup, I knew it! Our bond just rose<n>another level!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
I bet you were all like, "Wow! I'm so<n>proud!" after seeing
me train all by<n>myself, weren't you?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Wait, don't tell me that collapsing<n>was part of your plan to
get me<n>training of my own free will?!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Yikes, I'm getting chills! You may not<n>look it, but you're a
real crafty one!<n>Sheesh!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
...Though if we're talking about being<n>crafty, then you and I
are partners in<n>crime.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Haha, you think so too?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Then I guess I'll have to look forward<n>to seeing more of
your future<n>schemes.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Like, what if we caused a huge upset<n>at the Twinkle Series?
...Just kidding!

She says it's a joke... but the fierce<n>determination welling
up in her eyes<n>tells a very different story.
